title: Russia's Chilling UFO Files: Nukes Aimed at New York Nearly Fired As Aliens Vanished
description: Declassified Soviet-era files describe a terrifying night in 1982 when UFOs hovered over a missile base, activated nuclear launch systems and almost sent weapons toward New York.

title: Dr. Muaz Khan successfully defends PhD thesis at UAP
Here are your chances in SC of being ‘abducted’ by space aliens, based on UFO reports
Frequent flyers: Washington ranks 1st in UFO sightings and 5th in alien abductions
description: Friendly rivalries between Washington and Oregon include many aspects of Northwest life, from college football to urban hipsterism (best microbrew? coziest kombucha culture?) to record rainfall.

title: Reddit Explodes Over Alleged Chinese UFO Crash Retrievals and Hair-Covered Alien Survivors
description: Online forums have erupted over claims that China retrieved crashed UFOs in the 1990s, including reports of short, hair-covered alien survivors.
